lead_paragraph: HAGENDORF--Sylvia. 1926-1996. Mommy we cannot believe 20 years have passed and the woman that was larger than life who had great style, compassion and humor is gone. But you have passed that on to your children and their children. We will be forever grateful. Missing you more than ever, Your Loving Family 1/3
